'Racing Club de Lens' (; commonly referred to as 'RC Lens' or simply 'Lens') is
a French association football club based in the northern city of Lens in the Pas-de-
Calais department. Its nickname, sang et or (), comes from its traditional
colours of red and gold. Their primary rivals are their northern neighbors Lille
OSC, with whom they contest the Derby du Nord.
